definition: farmstead/village/manor/place of business/banker (in a gambling game)/grave or solemn/holdings of a landlord (in imperial China)

sentences.english: His long hair and filthy clothes repelled her.
sentences.chinese: 他的长头发和脏衣服使她感到厌恶。

sentences.english: She was all cold and bedraggled after falling into the river.
sentences.chinese: 她跌落河中后把全身弄得又湿又脏又冷。

sentences.english: Use a washcloth to clean the area if the wound is dirty.
sentences.chinese: 如果伤口处有点脏，可以用毛巾清洗。

sentences.english: Hers is a manically full life.
sentences.chinese: 她的每一只手指头都是脏的。

sentences.english: The dirty dishes were all washed and dried.
sentences.chinese: 所有的脏碟盘都洗干净了。

sentences.english: They should not be left lying around, they are sure to get wrinkled and soiled.
sentences.chinese: 不要随意乱放，以至于弄得又绉又脏。

sentences.english: But this he declined , as he was dirty and wet.
sentences.chinese: 不过，这被他谢绝了，因为他浑身又脏又湿。

sentences.english: “It’s dirty, hot and smelly here, ” she said wistfully.
sentences.chinese: 这里脏，热而且臭，“她充满渴望地说。”

sentences.english: Shuck your dirty shirt and put on a new one.
sentences.chinese: 把你的脏衬衣脱了，换一件干净的。

sentences.english: Ah, I feel like a dog chasing dirty mice.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉就像野狗追逐脏老鼠一样恶心。

sentences.english: Mother distressed me, let me step down in deep-water dirty, foul.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈心疼我，不让我下来踩到又脏又臭的深水里。

sentences.english: They are washed well When you put on the clothes.
sentences.chinese: 当你换衣脏的衣服已洗好了。

sentences.english: If there is missing or dirty data, how will you proceed?
sentences.chinese: 如果有丢失的或脏数据，您将如何进行呢？

sentences.english: The sergeant lay in his dirty long-sleeved underwear .
sentences.chinese: 军曹躺在那儿，只穿着一件脏了的长袖内衣。

sentences.english: Probably, men's uncleanliness is due to their laziness.
sentences.chinese: 男人的脏大概是由于懒。

sentences.english: Dirty checking is used to verify that an object has not been modified during a long transaction.
sentences.chinese: 脏检查用于验证对象在长事务期间没有被修改。

definition: to hide dirt, to conceal corruption (idiom); to shelter evil people and accept wrongdoing/aiding and abetting wicked deeds
trash/refuse/garbage/(coll.) of poor quality/Taiwan pr. [le4 se4]
